# AUDIO::PLAY_PED_AMBIENT_SPEECH_AND_CLONE_NATIVE

## Summary
Plays a line of a ped's ambient dialogue and clones it across the network

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex: Index of the actor to speak
* **STRING** context: Speech context to be spoken
* **STRING** params: Name of the speechParam rave game object to look to for various details on how it should be played
* **BOOL** syncOverNetwork = true: Indicates whether this speech should automatically by played on clones of the ped on remote machines

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Plays ambient speech. See also _0x5C57B85D.

See PLAY_PED_AMBIENT_SPEECH_NATIVE for parameter specifications.

Full list of speeches and voices names by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/speeches.json
